如人飲水，冷暖自知.pinyin: ru2 ren2 yin3 shui3 , leng3 nuan3 zi4 zhi1
如人飲水，冷暖自知.definition: the person who drinks it knows best whether the water is hot or cold (Zen proverb); self-awareness comes from within; to know best by personal experience

如來.definition: tathagata (Buddha's name for himself, having many layers of meaning - Sanskrit: thus gone, having been Brahman, gone to the absolute etc)

如來佛.definition: Tathagata, one of the ten sacred names of Buddha

如來佛的掌心.pinyin: Ru2 lai2 fo2 de5 zhang3 xin1
如來佛的掌心.definition: the palm of the Buddha's hand (a metaphor for a higher authority or force from whose control one cannot break free, from 西遊記|西游记[Xi1you2 Ji4], "Journey to the West")

如假包換.definition: replacement guaranteed if not genuine; fig. authentic

如出一轍.definition: to be precisely the same; to be no different

如喪考妣.definition: lit. as if in mourning for one's parents (idiom); fig. (often pejorative) inconsolable; distraught

如坐針氈.definition: lit. as if sitting on pins and needles (idiom); fig. to be in an uncomfortable situation

如墮五里霧中.pinyin: ru2 duo4 wu3 li3 wu4 zhong1
如墮五里霧中.definition: as if lost in a thick fog (idiom); in a fog; muddled; completely unfamiliar with sth

如墮煙霧.definition: as if degenerating into smoke (idiom); ignorant and unable to see where things are heading

如履薄冰.definition: lit. as if walking on thin ice (idiom); fig. to be extremely cautious; to be skating on thin ice

如影隨形.definition: lit. as the shadow follows the body (idiom); fig. closely associated with each other; inseparable; to follow relentlessly

如意.definition: as one wants; according to one's wishes; ruyi scepter, a symbol of power and good fortune

如意算盤.definition: counting one's chickens before they are hatched

如故.definition: as before; as usual; (to be) like old friends

如數.definition: in the amount stipulated (by prior agreement); in full; in the same amount

如數家珍.definition: lit. as if enumerating one's family valuables (idiom); fig. to be very familiar with a matter

如日中天.definition: lit. like the sun at noon (idiom); fig. to be at the peak of one's power, career etc

如是我聞.definition: so I have heard (idiom); the beginning clause of Buddha's quotations as recorded by his disciple, Ananda (Buddhism)

如有所失.definition: to seem as if something is amiss (idiom)

如東.definition: Rudong county in Nantong 南通[Nan2 tong1], Jiangsu

如東縣.definition: Rudong county in Nantong 南通[Nan2 tong1], Jiangsu

如果.definition: if; in case; in the event that

如果說.definition: if; if one were to say

如此這般.definition: thus and so; such and such

如法泡製.definition: lit. to follow the recipe (idiom); to follow the same plan

如法炮製.definition: lit. to follow the recipe (idiom); fig. to follow a set pattern

如泣如訴.definition: lit. as if weeping and complaining (idiom); fig. (of music, singing etc) mournful

如狼似虎.definition: lit. like wolves and tigers; ruthless

如獲至寶.definition: as if gaining the most precious treasure

如皋.definition: Rugao, county-level city in Nantong 南通[Nan2 tong1], Jiangsu

如皋市.definition: Rugao, county-level city in Nantong 南通市[Nan2tong1 Shi4], Jiangsu

如簧之舌.definition: lit. a tongue like a reed (idiom); fig. a glib tongue

如約而至.definition: to arrive as planned; right on schedule

如膠似漆.definition: stuck together as by glue (of lovers); joined at the hip

如臂使指.definition: as the arm moves the finger (idiom); freely and effortlessly; to have perfect command of

如臨大敵.definition: lit. as if meeting a great enemy (idiom); fig. cautious; with great preoccupation; with strict precaution

如花似玉.definition: delicate as a flower, refined as a precious jade (idiom); (of a woman) exquisite

如虎添翼.definition: lit. like a tiger that has grown wings; with redoubled power (idiom)

如蛆附骨.definition: lit. like maggots feeding on a corpse (idiom); fig. fixed on sth; to cling on without letting go; to pester obstinately

如蟻附膻.definition: like ants pursuing a stink (idiom); the mob chases the rich and powerful; the crowd runs after trash

如蠅逐臭.definition: like flies pursuing a stink (idiom); the mob chases the rich and powerful; the crowd runs after trash

如許.definition: (literary) like this; such (as this); so much; so many

如訴如泣.definition: see 如泣如訴|如泣如诉[ru2qi4-ru2su4]

如醉如癡.definition: lit. as if drunk and stupefied (idiom); intoxicated by sth; obsessed with; mad about sth; also written 如癡如醉|如痴如醉[ru2 chi1 ru2 zui4]

如釋重負.definition: as if relieved from a burden (idiom); to have a weight off one's mind

如金似玉.definition: like gold or jade (idiom); gorgeous; lovely; splendorous

如雲.definition: like the clouds in the sky (i.e. numerous)

如雷貫耳.definition: lit. like thunder piercing the ear; a well-known reputation (idiom)

如題.definition: as the title suggests; as indicated in the title

如飢似渴.definition: to hunger for sth (idiom); eagerly; to long for sth

如魚得水.definition: like a fish back in water (idiom); glad to be back in one's proper surroundings

如鯁在喉.definition: lit. as if having a fish bone stuck in one's throat (idiom); fig. very upset and needing to express one's displeasure

如鳥獸散.definition: lit. to scatter like birds and beasts (idiom); fig. to flee in all directions
